thread.title: Toyota recalls about 2 million US vehicles for power windows
thread.title_full: Toyota recalls about 2 million US vehicles for power windows - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: RNN Staff
title: Toyota recalls about 2 million US vehicles for power windows
text:
(RNN) - Toyota announced Wednesday it is launching a recall for about 2 million Toyota vehicles over a potential fire hazard related to the driver's-side power windows.
The vehicles' power window master switch on the driver's side was produced without sufficient lubricant, according to a Toyota news release , creating the potential for fire.
The affected vehicles are the following:
2007 and 2009 Camry and Camry Hybrid 2009-2011 Corolla 2008-2011 Highlander and Highlander Hybrid 2009-2011 Matrix 2006-2011 RAV4R 2009-2011 Sequoia 2009-2011 Tundra 2006-2011 Yaris 2009-2011 Scion xB 2009-2011 Scion xD "If not enough grease is applied, under certain conditions the switch may develop a short circuit that can cause the switch assembly to overheat and melt," the release said. "A melting switch can produce smoke and potentially lead to a fire."
Owners of the vehicles will be notified by first-class mail. Dealers will inspect the power window switch and apply the necessary grease. They also will inspect the part for damage and replace it if necessary.
People also can find out more about Toyota recalls at the Toyota recall web page .
